title: adjunct_combine_str.py
description: A simple helper function for fat_proc* scripts that processes string selectors and outputs a new string selector.

upper_index.title: Upper Index
upper_index.description: An int that is the upper index for the selector (-1 means to use the max number in the input strings)

string_selectors.title: String Selectors
string_selectors.description: One or more string selector strings of *goods* to keep
